methods.name: AllowGeolocationAccess
methods.description: Method for AllowGeolocationAccess

methods.name: CanGoBack
methods.description: Gets whether this WebView has a back history item

methods.name: CanGoBackOrForward
methods.description: Gets whether the page can go back or forward the given number of steps.

methods.name: CanGoForward
methods.description: Gets whether this WebView has a forward history item.

methods.name: CancelPrinting
methods.description: Cancels current print job. You can request cancellation of a queued, started, blocked, or failed print job.

methods.name: CheckDrawOverlayPermission
methods.description: Checks whether the overlay permission is active.

methods.name: CheckMyAppSignature
methods.description: Check if the app's signature matches the expected signature.

methods.name: ClearCache
methods.description: Clears the resource cache.

methods.name: ClearCookies
methods.description: Removes all cookies and raises 'CookiesRemoved' event

methods.name: ClearFormData
methods.description:
Clears the form data of the webview
Added by Xoma

methods.name: ClearInternalHistory
methods.description: Tells this WebView to clear its internal back/forward list.

methods.name: ClearLocation
methods.description: Clear all location preferences.

methods.name: ClearMatches
methods.description: Clears the highlighting surrounding text matches.

methods.name: CloseAppOnRecentPressed
methods.description: Method for CloseAppOnRecentPressed

methods.name: ConfirmJs
methods.description: Whether to proceed JavaScript originated request

methods.name: ContentHeight
methods.description: Gets height of HTML content

methods.name: ContinueJs
methods.description: Inputs a confirmation response to Js

methods.name: CreateShortcut
methods.description: Creates a shortcut of given website on home screen

methods.name: CreateWebView
methods.description: Creates the webview in given arrangement with id

methods.name: CurrentId
methods.description: Returns current id

methods.name: DismissJsAlert
methods.description: Dismiss previously requested Js alert

methods.name: DismissViewFloating
methods.description: Hides the floating component.

methods.name: Dissmiss
methods.description: Dismiss latest dialog

methods.name: EvaluateJavaScript
methods.description: Asynchronously evaluates JavaScript in the context of the currently displayed page.

methods.name: Find
methods.description: Finds all instances of find on the page and highlights them, asynchronously. Successive calls to this will cancel any pending searches.

methods.name: FindNext
methods.description: Highlights and scrolls to the next match if 'forward' is true else scrolls to previous match.

methods.name: GetCookies
methods.description: Get cookies for specific url

methods.name: GetIds
methods.description: Returns a list of used ids

methods.name: GetInternalHistory
methods.description: Get internal history of given webview.

methods.name: GetPositionX
methods.description: Gets the X coordinate that the floating view is in.

methods.name: GetPositionY
methods.description: Gets the Y coordinate that the floating view is in.

methods.name: GetProgress
methods.description: Gets the progress for the given webview

methods.name: GetScrollX
methods.description: Return the scrolled left position of the webview

methods.name: GetScrollY
methods.description: Return the scrolled top position of the webview

methods.name: GetSslCertificate
methods.description: Gets the SSL certificate for the main top-level page and raises 'GotCertificate' event

methods.name: GetTotalRAMHumanized
methods.description: Get total RAM in a human-readable format

methods.name: GetTotalRAMInBytes
methods.description: Get total RAM in bytes

methods.name: GetTotalRAMValue
methods.description: Get total RAM value

methods.name: GetWebView
methods.description: Returns webview object from id

methods.name: GetWindowBrightness
methods.description: Method for GetWindowBrightness

methods.name: GoBack
methods.description: Goes back in the history of this WebView.

methods.name: GoBackOrForward
methods.description: Goes to the history item that is the number of steps away from the current item. Steps is negative if backward and positive if forward.

methods.name: GoForward
methods.description: Goes forward in the history of this WebView.

methods.name: GoToUrl
methods.description: Loads the given URL.

methods.name: GrantPermission
methods.description: Grants given permissions to webview.Use empty list to deny the request.

methods.name: HideCustomView
methods.description: Hides previously shown custom view

methods.name: HideNavigationBarHP
methods.description: Hide the navigation bar (including recent apps, home, and back buttons).

methods.name: HideStatusBarHP
methods.description: Hide the status bar at the top of the screen.

methods.name: InvokeZoomPicker
methods.description: Invokes the graphical zoom picker widget for this WebView. This will result in the zoom widget appearing on the screen to control the zoom level of this WebView.Note that it does not checks whether zoom is enabled or not.

methods.name: IsConnectedNetwork
methods.description: Method for IsConnectedNetwork

methods.name: IsDeveloperModeEnabled
methods.description: Check if developer mode is enabled.

methods.name: IsRooted
methods.description: Method for IsRooted

methods.name: LoadHtml
methods.description: Loads the given data into this WebView using a 'data' scheme URL.

methods.name: LoadInNewWindow
methods.description: Loads requested url in given webview

methods.name: LoadWithHeaders
methods.description: Loads the given URL with the specified additional HTTP headers defined is list of lists.

methods.name: LoseFocusFloatingView
methods.description: Loses focus on the floating window.

methods.name: Mode
methods.description: Method for Mode

methods.name: OpenScreenName
methods.description: Method for OpenScreenName

methods.name: OverlapView
methods.description:
Through this block it is possible to overlap any visible component on another.
margins (list):
	index 1 -> margin left (number)
	index 2 -> margin top (number)
	index 3 -> margin right(number)
	index 4 -> margin bottom (number)
gravity (number):
	0  -> TOP-LEFT
	1  -> TOP-CENTER
	2  -> TOP-RIGHT
	3  -> CENTER-LEFT
	4  -> CENTER
	5  -> CENTER-RIGHT
	6  -> BOTTOM-LEFT
	7  -> BOTTOM-CENTER
	8  -> BOTTOM-RIGHT

methods.name: PageDown
methods.description: Scrolls the contents of the WebView down by half the page size

methods.name: PageUp
methods.description: Scrolls the contents of the WebView up by half the page size

methods.name: PauseWebView
methods.description: Does a best-effort attempt to pause any processing that can be paused safely, such as animations and geolocation. Note that this call does not pause JavaScript.

methods.name: PlayAudioPath
methods.description: Play audio from a specified path.

methods.name: PostData
methods.description: Loads the URL with postData using 'POST' method into active WebView.

methods.name: PrintWebContent
methods.description: Prints the content of webview with given document name

methods.name: ProceedHttpAuthRequest
methods.description: Instructs the WebView to proceed with the authentication with the given credentials.If both parameters are empty then it will cancel the request.

methods.name: ProceedSslError
methods.description: Method for ProceedSslError

methods.name: RegisterDeepLink
methods.description: Registers to open specified link in associated external app(s)

methods.name: Reload
methods.description: Reloads the current URL.

methods.name: RemoveWebView
methods.description: Destroys the webview and removes it completely from view system

methods.name: RequestDrawOverlayPermission
methods.description: Redirects to application settings to allow overlay permission.

methods.name: RequestFocusFloatingView
methods.description: Prompts to focus on the floating window.

methods.name: RestartPrinting
methods.description: Restarts current/previous print job. You can request restart of a failed print job.

methods.name: RestoreFloatingView
methods.description: Returns the floating window to the screen.

methods.name: ResubmitForm
methods.description: Whether to resubmit form or not.

methods.name: ResumeWebView
methods.description: Resumes the previously paused WebView.

methods.name: RingtoneGet
methods.description: Get current ringtone. Type can be RINGTONE, NOTIFICATION or ALARM.

methods.name: RingtonePlay
methods.description: Play ringtone. Type can be RINGTONE, NOTIFICATION or ALARM.

methods.name: RingtoneStop
methods.description: Stop currently playing ringtone.

methods.name: SaveArchive
methods.description: Saves the current site as a web archive

methods.name: ScrollTo
methods.description: Scrolls the webview to given position

methods.name: SetCookies
methods.description: Sets cookies for given url

methods.name: SetExpectedSignature
methods.description: Set the expected app signature.

methods.name: SetPosition
methods.description: Moves the floating view to the indicated coordinates.

methods.name: SetVisibility
methods.description: Sets the visibility of webview by id

methods.name: SetWebView
methods.description: Set specific webview to current webview by id

methods.name: ShowAlert
methods.description: Show a original toast of android

methods.name: ShowAlertAtCenter
methods.description: Show a original toast of android at the center of the screen

methods.name: ShowDialog
methods.description: Show a View dialog

methods.name: ShowFloatingView
methods.description: Displays the floating component.

methods.name: StartLockTask
methods.description: Method for StartLockTask

methods.name: StopLoading
methods.description: Stops the current load.

methods.name: StopLockTask
methods.description: Method for StopLockTask

methods.name: UploadFile
methods.description: Uploads the given file from content uri.Use empty string to cancel the upload request.

methods.name: ZoomBy
methods.description: Performs a zoom operation in the WebView by given zoom percent

methods.name: ZoomIn
methods.description: Performs zoom in in the WebView

methods.name: ZoomOut
methods.description: Performs zoom out in the WebView

blockProperties.name: AdHosts
blockProperties.description: Property for AdHosts

blockProperties.name: AllowScreenshotsUser
blockProperties.description: Property for AllowScreenshotsUser

blockProperties.name: AudioPathSource
blockProperties.description: Source of the audio path.

blockProperties.name: AutoLoadImages
blockProperties.description: Returnss whether the WebView should load image resources

blockProperties.name: AutoplayMedia
blockProperties.description: Returns whether the WebView requires a user gesture to play media

blockProperties.name: BackgoundColor
blockProperties.description: Property for BackgoundColor

blockProperties.name: BackgroundColor
blockProperties.description: Sets background color of webview

blockProperties.name: BlockAds
blockProperties.description: Property for BlockAds

blockProperties.name: BlockNetworkLoads
blockProperties.description: Sets whether the WebView should not load resources from the network.Use this to save data.

blockProperties.name: Brightness
blockProperties.description: brightness (a value between 0 and 255)

blockProperties.name: BrightnessMode
blockProperties.description: brightness mode (MANUAL or AUTO)

blockProperties.name: CacheMode
blockProperties.description: Sets cache mode for active webview

blockProperties.name: CurrentPageTitle
blockProperties.description: Title of the page currently viewed

blockProperties.name: CurrentUrl
blockProperties.description: URL of the page currently viewed

blockProperties.name: DeepLinks
blockProperties.description: Property for DeepLinks

blockProperties.name: DesktopMode
blockProperties.description: Returns whether to load content in desktop mode

blockProperties.name: DisplayZoom
blockProperties.description: Gets whether the WebView should display on-screen zoom controls

blockProperties.name: EnableJS
blockProperties.description: Tells the WebView to enable JavaScript execution.

blockProperties.name: FileAccess
blockProperties.description: Sets whether webview can access local files.Use this to enable file uploading and loading files using HTML

blockProperties.name: FollowLinks
blockProperties.description: Determines whether to follow links when they are tapped in the WebViewer.If you follow links, you can use GoBack and GoForward to navigate the browser history

blockProperties.name: FontScale
blockProperties.description: Property for FontScale

blockProperties.name: FontSize
blockProperties.description: Sets the default font size of text. The default is 16.

blockProperties.name: GetClickable
blockProperties.description: Checks whether the floating view is clickable.

blockProperties.name: GetFloatingViewVisible
blockProperties.description: Checks if the floating is present on the screen.

blockProperties.name: InitialScale
blockProperties.description: Sets the initial scale for active WebView. 0 means default. If initial scale is greater than 0, WebView starts with this value as initial scale.

blockProperties.name: LayerType
blockProperties.description: Sets layer type

blockProperties.name: LoadWithOverviewMode
blockProperties.description: Sets whether the WebView loads pages in overview mode, that is, zooms out the content to fit on screen by width. This setting is taken into account when the content width is greater than the width of the WebView control.

blockProperties.name: LongClickable
blockProperties.description: Returns whether text selection and context menu are enabled or not

blockProperties.name: OverScrollMode
blockProperties.description: Sets over scroll mode

blockProperties.name: PromptForPermission
blockProperties.description: Returns whether webview will prompt for permission and raise 'OnPermissionRequest' event or not

blockProperties.name: RotationAngle
blockProperties.description: Sets rotation angle

blockProperties.name: ScrollBar
blockProperties.description: Whether to display horizonatal and vertical scrollbars or not

blockProperties.name: ScrollBarStyle
blockProperties.description: Sets scroll bar style

blockProperties.name: Scrollable
blockProperties.description: Property for Scrollable

blockProperties.name: SetAudioPathSource
blockProperties.description: Property for SetAudioPathSource

blockProperties.name: SetClickable
blockProperties.description: Adjusts whether the floating view is clickable

blockProperties.name: ShowUI
blockProperties.description: whether User Interface shoud be showed while setting the volume.

blockProperties.name: SupportMultipleWindows
blockProperties.description: Sets whether the WebView supports multiple windows

blockProperties.name: SuppressToast
blockProperties.description: Property for SuppressToast

blockProperties.name: SuppressWarnings
blockProperties.description: Property for SuppressWarnings

blockProperties.name: UseWideViewPort
blockProperties.description: Sets whether the WebView should enable support for the 'viewport' HTML meta tag or should use a wide viewport.

blockProperties.name: UserAgent
blockProperties.description: Get webview user agent

blockProperties.name: UsesLocation
blockProperties.description: Whether or not to give the application permission to use the Javascript geolocation API

blockProperties.name: VibrationEnabled
blockProperties.description: Sets whether vibration feedback enabled on long click

blockProperties.name: Visible
blockProperties.description: Returns the visibility of current webview

blockProperties.name: VolumeAlarm
blockProperties.description: notification volume in percent.

blockProperties.name: VolumeMusic
blockProperties.description: media volume in percent.

blockProperties.name: VolumeRing
blockProperties.description: ringtone volume in percent.

blockProperties.name: WebViewString
blockProperties.description: Set webview string

blockProperties.name: ZoomEnabled
blockProperties.description: Gets whether the WebView should support zooming using its on-screen zoom controls and gestures

blockProperties.name: ZoomPercent
blockProperties.description: Sets the zoom of the page in percent. The default is 100

blockProperties.name: getSdkVersion
blockProperties.description: Property for getSdkVersion

events.name: AfterArchiveSaved
events.description: Event raised after 'SaveArchive' method.If 'success' is true then returns file path else empty string.

events.name: AfterDismiss
events.description: Event for AfterDismiss

events.name: AfterJavaScriptEvaluated
events.description: Event raised after evaluating Js and returns result.

events.name: ClickView
events.description: Executes after clicking on the floating component.

events.name: Completed
events.description: Event for Completed

events.name: CookiesRemoved
events.description: Event raised after 'ClearCokies' method with result

events.name: Failed
events.description: Event for Failed

events.name: FileUploadNeeded
events.description: Event raised when file uploading is needed

events.name: FindResultReceived
events.description: Event raised after 'Find' method with int 'activeMatchOrdinal','numberOfMatches' and 'isDoneCounting'

events.name: GotCertificate
events.description: Event raised after getting SSL certificate of current displayed url/website with boolean 'isSecure' and Strings 'issuedBy','issuedTo' and 'validTill'.If 'isSecure' is false and other values are empty then assume that website is not secure

events.name: GotPrintResult
events.description: Event raised after getting previus print's result.

events.name: LongClicked
events.description: Event raised when something is long clicked in webview with item(image,string,empty,etc) and type(item type like 0,1,8,etc)

events.name: OnCloseWindowRequest
events.description: Event triggered when a window needs to be closed

events.name: OnConsoleMessage
events.description: Event raised after getting console message.

events.name: OnDownloadNeeded
events.description: Event raised when downloading is needed.

events.name: OnErrorReceived
events.description: Event raised when any error is received during loading url and returns message,error code and failing url

events.name: OnFormResubmission
events.description: Event raised when resubmission of form is needed

events.name: OnGeolocationRequested
events.description: Event raised when page asks for location access. Developer must handle/show dialog from him/herself.

events.name: OnHideCustomView
events.description: Event raised when current page exits from full screen mode

events.name: OnJsAlert
events.description: Event raised when Js have to show an alert to user

events.name: OnJsConfirm
events.description: Tells to display a confirm dialog to the user.

events.name: OnJsPrompt
events.description: Event raised when JavaScript needs input from user

events.name: OnNewWindowRequest
events.description: Event raised when new window is requested by webview with boolean 'isDialog' and 'isPopup'

events.name: OnPermissionRequest
events.description: Event raised when a website asks for specific permission(s) in list format.

events.name: OnProgressChanged
events.description: Fires when Progress changed.

events.name: OnReceivedHttpAuthRequest
events.description: Notifies that the WebView received an HTTP authentication request.

events.name: OnReceivedSslError
events.description: Event for OnReceivedSslError

events.name: OnScrollChanged
events.description: Event raised when webview gets scrolled

events.name: OnShowCustomView
events.description: Event raised when current page enters in full screen mode

events.name: PageLoaded
events.description: Event raised when page loading has finished.

events.name: PageStarted
events.description: Event indicating that page loading has started in web view.

events.name: PermissionDenied
events.description: Permission has been denied.

events.name: PositionMoved
events.description: View moved from position

events.name: Progress
events.description: Event for Progress

events.name: Swiped
events.description: Event raised when webview is swiped

events.name: WebViewStringChanged
events.description: When the JavaScript calls AppInventor.setWebViewString this event is run.

events.name: onProgressChanged
events.description: Event raised when page loading progress has changed.

methods.name: OverlapView
methods.description:
Through this block it is possible to overlap any visible component on another.
margins (list):
	index 1 -> margin left (number)
	index 2 -> margin top (number)
	index 3 -> margin right(number)
	index 4 -> margin bottom (number)
gravity (number):
	0  -> TOP-LEFT
	1  -> TOP-CENTER
	2  -> TOP-RIGHT
	3  -> CENTER-LEFT
	4  -> CENTER
	5  -> CENTER-RIGHT
	6  -> BOTTOM-LEFT
	7  -> BOTTOM-CENTER
	8  -> BOTTOM-RIGHT
